page.title: 20Eating Out in Alrewas\Barton
page.content: There are two restaurants.The George and Dragon in Alrewas Main St. opened in 1836.It is a MarstonÂ£s Public House with restaurant and motel attached.18 people work there.Bar meals are provided at lunchtime for businessmen and an a la carte menu is available in the evening,mostly for couples or families.21 peple can be seated.The other restaurant is The Little Chef on the A38,near Barton.This was opened in 1982 and seats 72. 26 people work here.This serves fast meals for travellers in cars but not lorries.It is open from 7a.m.-10p.p.m. for 7 days a week.The barges on the canal bring business in summer.There is also a Fish and Chip shop in Alrewas, and a Chinese Take-Away in Barton. This survey was compiled by teachers and pupils from John Taylor High School,Barton-Under-Needwood,Staffs.
